DOC.brief_summary: The study compare magnitude antibody response safety GBS Trivalent Vaccine HIV positive HIV negative pregnant woman offspring . In addition study investigate maternal fetal transfer antibody induce investigational vaccine .
DOC.brief_title: Magnitude Antibody Response Safety GBS Trivalent Vaccine HIV Positive HIV Negative Pregnant Women Their Offsprings
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman 1840 year age 2435 week gestation Women HIVneg HIVpos WHO stage I II disease CD4+ count > 50 cells/µL Women CD4+ count ≤ 50 cells/µL Women HIVpos WHO stage III IV disease , history severe allergic reaction previous vaccination
